BasicInfo.short: CSRware provides delivery of environmental sustainability compliance software using a cloud-based model.

Products.name: Environmental Sustainability Compliance Software
Products.description: CSRware's Conflict Minerals Mgmt software is aligned with the SEC issue rule on Conflict Minerals pursuant to Dodd-Frank Section 1502

Products.name: CSRware Energy & Sustainability Management (ESM)
Products.description: CSRware for Energy & Sustainability Management (ESM) The CSRware ESM solution is highly configurable Cloud-based software

Products.name: Sustainable Supply Chain (SSC)
Products.description: Supplier Analytics to assess risk & cut costs by reducing on-site factory audits by identifying Leaders or those who need improvement.
